text:
="preserve">Robert Spurgeon Bloxom Sr. (April 26, 1937 – December 13, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates from 1978 to 2004. Bloxom was the State Secretary of Agriculture and Forestry from 2005 to 2010. Bloxom was born in Baltimore, Maryland.
Bloxom died on December 13, 2020 in Mappsville, Virginia at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: State Secretary of Agriculture and Forestry
